mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sftc_order_express (order_number, ship_name, ship_mobile, ship_province, ship_city, ship_area, ship_addr, package_type, object_type, create_time) VALUES (#{order_number}, #{ship_name}, #{ship_mobile}, #{ship_province}, #{ship_city}, #{ship_area}, #{ship_addr}, #{package_type}, #{object_type}, #{create_time})
